Description.Name: Basic Attack: Kazahana
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Unleashes up to five slashes ahead, the first two deal <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>, and the last three deal <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Block enemy attacks during the 5th hit of the <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack</color>.

Description.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
Description.Desc:
With at least 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, hold <IconMap:Icon_Normal> to activate:
Hoshimi Miyabi sheaths her blade, enters <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> and starts to charge up. Every level of charge will consume 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>, up to a maximum of three levels of charge.
When releasing <IconMap:Icon_Normal>, or when <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, Hoshimi Miyabi will draw her blade and unleash a powerful slash ahead based on the current charge level, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>. She then exits <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Character is invulnerable during <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>.
Hoshimi Miyabi can have up to 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.

Param.Name: Charge Level One Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash DMG Multiplier
Charge Level One Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Two Slash Daze Multiplier
Charge Level Three Slash Daze Multiplier

Description.Name: Dodge: Mizutori
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A quick dash dodge.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
While dodging, repeatedly press or hold <IconMap:Icon_Evade> to activate:
A dash dodge that covers a lot of ground.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Dash Attack: Fuyubachi
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a dodge to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#F0D12B>Physical DMG</color>.

Description.Name: Dodge Counter: Kan Suzume
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> during a <color=#FFFFFF>Perfect Dodge</color> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Special Attack: Miyuki
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Special> to activate:
Quickly draws her blade and slashes ahead, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Anti-Interrupt level is increased while using this skill.

Description.Name: EX Special Attack: Hisetsu
Description.Desc:
With enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> to activate:
Rush forward, unleashing powerful slashes against enemies along the way, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.
After using this skill, with enough Energy, press <IconMap:Icon_SpecialReady> again to activate:
Consume extra Energy and unleash a powerful follow-up attack against enemies in front, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Chain Attack: Spring's Call
Description.Desc:
When a <color=#FFFFFF>Chain Attack</color> is triggered, select the character to activate:
Unleashes a powerful slash at enemies in front in a large area, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Ultimate: Lingering Snow
Description.Desc:
When Decibel Rating is at <color=#FFFFFF>Maximum</color>, press <IconMap:Icon_UltimateReady> to activate:
Unleashes powerful slashes at enemies ahead in a large area then pauses, before unleashing a Finishing Move, dealing massive <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Upon activating this skill, gain 3 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and increase <color=#98EFF0>Ice DMG</color> by 30% for 12s.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Quick Assist: Dancing Petals
Description.Desc:
When the active character is launched, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Defensive Assist: Drifting Petals
Description.Desc:
When the on-field character is about to be attacked, press <IconMap:Icon_Switch> to activate:
Parries the enemy's attack, dealing massive Daze.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

Description.Name: Assist Follow-Up: Falling Petals
Description.Desc:
Press <IconMap:Icon_Normal> after a <color=#FFFFFF>Defensive Assist</color> to activate:
Charges and slashes enemies in front, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>.
Character is invulnerable while using this skill.

1091003.Name: Basic Attack: Shimotsuki
1091003.Desc: <IconMap:Icon_Normal> (Hold) (With at least 2 points of Fallen Frost)

Name: Core Passive: Searing Cold
Additional Ability: Bask in Frost
Desc:
When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color> against targets with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, increases <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. As Hoshimi Miyabi accumulates <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color>, it has its own independent Attribute Anomaly Buildup gauge and triggers <color=#98EFF0>Freeze</color>, <color=#98EFF0>Shatter</color>, and <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> that can react with other Attribute Anomalies, including <color=#98EFF0>Ice Attribute Anomaly</color>, to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>.
When Hoshimi Miyabi applies <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> to enemies with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, it will consume the <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to trigger <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, dealing <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color> equal to <color=#2BAD00>750%</color> of Hoshimi Miyabi's ATK and causing the target to enter the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state. All squad members accumulate <color=#2BAD00>14%</color> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to these enemies. The <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state ends when <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> and remove <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>.
Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> during the next <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> will ignore 30% of the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color>.

Name: Core Passive: Searing Cold
Additional Ability: Bask in Frost
Desc:
When Hoshimi Miyabi deals <color=#98EFF0>Frost DMG</color>, she applies <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to the target, lasting 30s. When accumulating <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup</color> against targets with <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color>, increases <color=#98EFF0>Frost Anomaly Buildup Rate</color> by 100% of Hoshimi Miyabi's CRIT Rate, up to a maximum increase of 80%. All squad members accumulate <color=#2BAD00>15%</color> more Anomaly Buildup against enemies under the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state, but Hoshimi Miyabi cannot reapply <color=#FFFFFF>Icefire</color> to these enemies. The <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state ends when <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> expires. While this state remains active, triggering another Attribute Anomaly will overwrite <color=#98EFF0>Frostbite</color> and remove <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>.
Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. This effect can trigger once every 10s.

When another character in your squad is a <color=#FFFFFF>Support</color> character or shares the same Faction:
<color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG increases by 60%. When any squad member triggers <color=#FFFFFF>Disorder</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains 2 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> during the next <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> will ignore 30% of the target's <color=#98EFF0>Ice RES</color>.

1.Name: Frost Atop the Snow
1.Desc: While in <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, every 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> consumed will allow <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> to ignore 6% of DEF, stacking up to 6 times and lasting until <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> ends. When the slash for charge level three of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> hits an enemy under <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color>, it will immediately remove the <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn</color> state and increase all squad members' Anomaly Buildup Rate by 20% for 10s.
1.Desc2:
Miyabi has loved reciting poems about the cold since she was a child. She might not understand them completely, but she still does it every day.
Before long, she came to realize their true meaning.
She found clarity not on a still and snowy night, but rather upon the battlefield.

2.Name: Breath Technique
2.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> and <color=#FFFFFF>Dodge Counter</color> DMG increases by 30%. Hoshimi Miyabi gains 1 point of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> when the final move of the 5th hit of <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Kazahana</color> hits an enemy. Upon entering the battlefield, Hoshimi Miyabi immediately obtains 6 points of <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> and her CRIT Rate increases by 15%.
2.Desc2:
"As goes the sword, so goes the heart." This is a key disciplinary concept of the Hoshimi school of swordsmanship.
Defeating the enemy is but the first step on the path to victory. 
Maintaining constant vigilance at all times is the true way of a warrior.

3.Name: Martial Discipline
3.Desc2: Miyabi, whose family has a tradition of martial arts, has excellent training habits. Her commitment to swordsmanship practice is unwavering. What? A meeting? She won't be going.

4.Name: Rupture
4.Desc: <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color> DMG increases by 30%. Upon triggering <color=#FFFFFF>Frostburn - Break</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi generates 250 more Decibels.
4.Desc2:
Reciting poems during the heat of battle can regulate one's respiratory rhythm.
Whether it's her mindset or breathing, Miyabi always keeps calm.

5.Name: Anniversary
5.Desc2:
The girl arrives at that all too familiar place with flowers, her breath misting and then vanishing into the cold air.
Her fingers ghost over that name on the monument.
Everything is quiet, like that most silence observer.

6.Name: Prodigious Talent
6.Desc: During <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi obtains <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, which increases <color=#FFFFFF>Basic Attack: Shimotsuki</color> DMG by 30%. After obtaining <color=#FFFFFF>Polar</color>, Hoshimi Miyabi will automatically draw her blade and unleash powerful slashes based on the current charge level upon consuming <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color>. Before <color=#FFFFFF>Fallen Frost</color> is completely depleted, the draw and slashes will not interrupt charging under <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color>. Each occurrence of <color=#FFFFFF>Shimotsuki Stance</color> can perform up to 3 draws and slashes.
6.Desc2: The more she battles, the more it becomes evident to outsiders: If there is a god of swordsmanship, it must greatly favor Hoshimi Miyabi.
